events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue was identified as a refund request due to an item not fitting.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for processing the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return the jacket and receive a refund. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with all tags intact?
My order number is 987654321. Yes, the jacket is still unused and all tags are attached exactly as received.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the return process immediately. You will receive a prepaid shipping label by email within the hour.
That sounds perfect, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and the help with the return.
The return label has been sent. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have returned the jacket and to see if you have received your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday, and I received the refund today. Thanks for the smooth process!
The case has been closed after successful refund confirmation and customer satisfaction.
A customer satisfaction survey was sent to gather feedback about the return and refund experience.
